import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './IdeaCard.css'; const IdeaCard = ({ title, description, onAdd, onExpand, onMerge, onEdit, onDelete, }) => { const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false); return (
setIsHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)} >

{title}

{description}

{isHovered && (
)}
); }; export default IdeaCard;
